title: Martin Luther King Jr National Historic Site: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth            Experience the joys of camping in the great outdoors in the city.  As a part of the National Park Service's Every Kid in a Park initiative, participating 4th-grade students from schools throughout the Metro-Atlanta area will enjoy a safe camping experience and share campfire fun! To register visit www.legacycampout.org.
